title: Extrarakeback
author: Extrarakeback
content: 200$ prize weekly for the person with highest wager How to participate:1 Go to https://www.extrarakeback.me/ and join a casino from our site 2 post your username and Wich casino in this post.  3 Start playing and 7 days from the time this post is opened we will announce the result How to win ? Be the person with highest wager on any of the sites. Prize : 1 winner 200usd will be paid to his address he provided when he joined any Casino.  Good luck.
